title: 309 46 "Fists Full of Emotion! Luffy Unleashes Gatling with All His Might!"Transliteration: "Kobushi ni Kometa Omoi! Rufi Konshin no Gātoringu" (Japanese:拳に込めた想い! ルフィ渾身の銃乱打) Makoto Sonoda Koga Naoki May 13, 2007(2007-05-13)[56] July 26, 2015
transformers_text: 309 46 Fists Full of Emotion Luffy Unleashes Gatling with All His Might Transliteration Ko bushi ni Ko meta Omo i Ru fi Kon shin no G to ring u Japanese Makoto Sonoda Koga Naoki May 13 2007 2007 05 13 56 July 26 2015 While the Straw Hats struggle to hold their own against those among Buster Call's fighting elite who have Devil Fruit powers an unmasked Us opp sees Luffy collapsed on the ground in front of Lucci Us opp cries out to him telling him to get back up But when Luffy is unable to move Us opp resorts to provoking Lucci to face him Presuming Luffy to be defeated Lucci decides to take Us opp's suggestion with the intention of slaughtering the entire Straw Hat crew before returning to finish Luffy off But Luffy spurred by Us opp's words gets back to his feet with a promise not to fall again until he wins Luffy then engages Lucci in a final fist fight Though Lucci hits him with his Six Kings Gun Luffy manages to stay on his feet to Lucci's disbelief Mustering all the strength he has left Luffy delivers a barrage of blows strong enough to break through Lucci's Iron Body technique Lucci's defeat is soon made public with a grinning Luffy collapsing to the floor
tf_idf_text: fist full emotion luffy unleashes gatling might transliteration bushi meta omo kon shin ring japanese makoto sonoda koga naoki may july straw hat struggle hold among buster call fight elite devil fruit power unmask opp see luffy collapse ground front lucci opp cry tell get back luffy unable move opp resort provoke lucci face presume luffy defeat lucci decides take opps suggestion intention slaughter entire straw hat crew return finish luffy luffy spur opps word get back foot promise not fall win luffy engage lucci final fist fight though lucci hit six king gun luffy manages stay foot luccis disbelief muster strength leave luffy delivers barrage blow strong enough break luccis iron body technique luccis defeat soon make public grinning luffy collapse floor
